data.title: You could make a meal of the Salad Bar Alone!
data.text: Stopped here as I was tired of driving around looking for a place to eat. Had The Tri-Tip and it was pretty good although small, but with the Salad bar you would not have to order a Main course at all. Huge Salad Bar with anything you can name. Was actually to much with steak and Potato. Was a little high priced, but good food. Wish I had one near in CO.

data.title: Kind of a tradition..
data.text: We found this place a year ago by mistake while away for our wedding anniversary and it's lovely.. came back for our anniversary again this year and it's still as good as ever.. great value and amazing food...

data.title: Found by mistake but wish we found it sooner
data.text:
We found this restaurant by mistake while looking for a burger place and thought we would give it a go

We arrived at 9pm and while they were due to close at half past we were welcomed. We ordered our food and took a seat the steaks we ordered we're delivered to our table in excellent time and perfectly cooked.

The value that you get from this place is unreal. 2 steaks with fries, two drinks, cheesy bread and ice cream for under $40 you just can't go wrong and the steak rivalled what we had eaten the night before at nearly ten times the price..

data.title: Can't beat the value
data.text:
Sometimes you just can't beat a Sizzler's. If you've never tried a Sizzler, then a) you must and b) this one in Pico is great!.
Enough food until you want to explode! There's heaps of variety and it's mostly fresh. Whilst a lot of fast food joints deep fry or griddle everything, Sizzler gives a little more. It's incredibly competitively priced, and the service when we went was attentive and thourough. If you are a food and service snob, then keep away. BUT if you appreciate value, big servings and good service, this is the place to come. We always do a Sizzler when we visit California from England, and they never disappoint. 5 Stars!
